description.brazilian: Preencha todos os planetas com população ao máximo.
description.english: Fill all planets with population to the maximum.
description.french: Remplissez toutes les planètes de population au maximum.
description.german: Füllen Sie alle Planeten maximal mit Bevölkerung.
description.russian: Заполните все планеты населением до максимума.
description.schinese: 让所有行星的人口达到最大。
description.spanish: Llena todos los planetas con población al máximo.

displayName.french: La diplomatie, ce n'est pas mon truc
displayName.spanish: La diplomacia no es lo mío.

description.brazilian: Comece uma guerra com todas as facções de uma só vez.
description.english: Start a war with all factions at once.
description.french: Démarrez une guerre avec toutes les factions en même temps.
description.german: Beginnen Sie einen Krieg mit allen Fraktionen gleichzeitig.
description.russian: Начните войну со всеми фракциями одновременно.
description.schinese: 立即与所有派系开战。
description.spanish: Comienza una guerra con todas las facciones a la vez.

description.brazilian: Derrote primeiro a facção Antiga, depois a facção Vermelha e depois a facção Verde.
description.english: Defeat the Ancient faction first, then the Red faction and then the Green faction.
description.french: Battez d'abord la faction Ancienne, puis la faction Rouge et enfin la faction Verte.
description.german: Besiege zuerst die Antike-Fraktion, dann die Rote-Fraktion und dann die Grüne-Fraktion.
description.russian: Сначала победите фракцию Древних, затем фракцию Красных, а затем фракцию Зеленых.
description.schinese: 先打败古派，然后打败红派，最后打败绿派。
description.spanish: Derrota primero a la facción Antigua, luego a la facción Roja y luego a la facción Verde.

description.brazilian: Ganhe com a opção "Pedidos de upgrade de depósito planetário"
description.english: Win with the option "Planetary deposit upgrade orders"
description.french: Gagnez avec l'option "Ordres de mise à niveau du dépôt planétaire"
description.german: Gewinnen Sie mit der Option „Upgrade-Auträge für Planetare Produktion“
description.russian: Выиграйте с опцией «Заказы на улучшение планетарного месторождения»
description.schinese: 通过“行星存款升级订单”选项获胜
description.spanish: Gana con la opción "Órdenes de actualización de depósitos planetarios"

description.brazilian: Ganhe com a opção “Depósito planetário consome recursos”
description.english: Win with the option "Planetary deposit consumes resources"
description.french: Gagnez avec l'option "Le dépôt planétaire consomme des ressources"
description.german: Gewinnen Sie mit der Option „Planetare Produktion benötigt Vorräte“
description.russian: Выиграйте с опцией «Планетарное месторождение потребляет ресурсы»
description.schinese: 通过“行星沉积消耗资源”选项获胜
description.spanish: Gana con la opción "El depósito planetario consume recursos"

description.brazilian: Ganhe com a opção "Longo prazo"
description.english: Win with the option "Long Run"
description.french: Gagnez avec l'option "Long terme"
description.german: Gewinnen Sie mit der Option „Langes Spiel“
description.russian: Выиграйте с опцией «Длинный забег».
description.schinese: 通过“长跑”选项获胜
description.spanish: Gana con la opción "Largo plazo"

description.brazilian: Ganhe com a opção "Modo de pesquisa alternativo (difícil)"
description.english: Win with the option "Alternative research mode (hard)"
description.french: Gagnez avec l'option "Mode de recherche alternatif (difficile)"
description.german: Gewinnen Sie mit der Option „Alternativer Forschungsmodus (schwer)“
description.russian: Победите с опцией «Альтернативный режим исследования (сложный)».
description.schinese: 选择“另类研究模式（困难）”选项获胜
description.spanish: Gana con la opción "Modo de investigación alternativo (difícil)"

displayName.brazilian: Vamos ver o que tem dentro
displayName.french: Voyons ce qu'il y a à l'intérieur
displayName.schinese: 让我们看看里面有什么

description.brazilian: Ganhe com a opção “Modo desmontador”
description.english: Win with the option "Disassembler Mode"
description.french: Gagnez avec l'option "Mode désassembleur"
description.german: Gewinnen Sie mit der Option „Demontierer-Modus“
description.russian: Победите с опцией «Режим дизассемблера»
description.schinese: 使用“反汇编模式”选项获胜
description.spanish: Gana con la opción "Modo desensamblador"

description.brazilian: Complete o jogo em menos de 30 horas de jogo.
description.english: Complete the game in less than 30 hours of in-game time.
description.french: Terminez le jeu en moins de 30 heures de jeu.
description.german: Beenden Sie das Spiel in weniger als 30 Stunden Spielzeit.
description.russian: Пройдите игру менее чем за 30 часов игрового времени.
description.schinese: 在不到 30 小时的游戏时间内完成游戏。
description.spanish: Completa el juego en menos de 30 horas de juego.

description.brazilian: Complete o jogo sem roubar navios de outras facções.
description.english: Complete the game without stealing ships from other factions.
description.french: Terminez le jeu sans voler les navires des autres factions.
description.german: Beenden Sie das Spiel, ohne Schiffe anderer Fraktionen zu stehlen.
description.russian: Пройдите игру без кражи кораблей у других фракций.
description.schinese: 在不窃取其他派系船只的情况下完成游戏。
description.spanish: Completa el juego sin robar barcos de otras facciones.

description.brazilian: Complete o jogo sem usar os projetos integrados.
description.english: Complete the game without using the built-in blueprints.
description.french: Terminez le jeu sans utiliser les plans intégrés.
description.german: Beenden Sie das Spiel, ohne die integrierten Blaupausen zu verwenden.
description.russian: Пройдите игру, не используя встроенные чертежи.
description.schinese: 不使用内置蓝图完成游戏。
description.spanish: Completa el juego sin utilizar los planos integrados.

description.brazilian: Complete o jogo sem usar rotas comerciais.
description.english: Complete the game without using trade routes.
description.french: Terminez le jeu sans utiliser les routes commerciales.
description.german: Beenden Sie das Spiel, ohne Handelsrouten zu nutzen.
description.russian: Пройдите игру без использования торговых маршрутов.
description.schinese: 不使用贸易路线完成游戏。
description.spanish: Completa el juego sin utilizar rutas comerciales.

description.brazilian: Complete o jogo sem usar um teletransportador espacial.
description.english: Complete the game without using a space teleporter.
description.french: Terminez le jeu sans utiliser de téléporteur spatial.
description.german: Beenden Sie das Spiel, ohne einen Weltraumteleporter zu verwenden.
description.russian: Пройдите игру, не используя космический телепорт.
description.schinese: 不使用空间传送器完成游戏。
description.spanish: Completa el juego sin usar un teletransportador espacial.

description.brazilian: Complete o jogo sem usar canhões de construção.
description.english: Complete the game without using construction cannons.
description.french: Terminez le jeu sans utiliser de canons de construction.
description.german: Beenden Sie das Spiel, ohne Baukanonen zu verwenden.
description.russian: Пройдите игру, не используя строительные пушки.
description.schinese: 不使用建筑大炮完成游戏。
description.spanish: Completa el juego sin utilizar cañones de construcción.

description.brazilian: Complete o jogo sem usar um materializador de matéria.
description.english: Complete the game without using a matter materializer.
description.french: Terminez le jeu sans utiliser de matérialiseur de matière.
description.german: Beenden Sie das Spiel, ohne einen Materiematerialisierer zu verwenden.
description.russian: Пройдите игру, не используя материализатор материи.
description.schinese: 不使用物质物化器完成游戏。
description.spanish: Completa el juego sin utilizar un materializador de materia.

description.brazilian: Complete o jogo sem usar armazenamento quântico.
description.english: Complete the game without using quantum storage.
description.french: Terminez le jeu sans utiliser le stockage quantique.
description.german: Beenden Sie das Spiel, ohne Quantenspeicher zu verwenden.
description.russian: Пройдите игру, не используя квантовое хранилище.
description.schinese: 不使用量子存储完成游戏。
description.spanish: Completa el juego sin utilizar almacenamiento cuántico.

description.brazilian: Complete o jogo usando apenas um tipo de arma.
description.english: Complete the game using only one type of weapon.
description.french: Terminez le jeu en utilisant un seul type d'arme.
description.german: Beenden Sie das Spiel mit nur einem Waffentyp.
description.russian: Пройдите игру, используя только один тип оружия.
description.schinese: 仅使用一种武器完成游戏。
description.spanish: Completa el juego usando solo un tipo de arma.

description.brazilian: Complete o jogo inteiro com restrições mínimas de tamanho da estação (2.000 células) e tamanho da nave espacial (1.000 células) nas configurações de jogo.
description.english: Complete the entire game with minimal restrictions on station size (2000 cells) and spaceship size (1000 cells) in the gameplay settings.
description.french: Terminez l'intégralité du jeu avec des restrictions minimales sur la taille de la station (2 000 cellules) et la taille du vaisseau spatial (1 000 cellules) dans les paramètres de jeu.
description.german: Beenden Sie das gesamte Spiel mit minimalen Einschränkungen hinsichtlich der Stationsgröße (2000 Zellen) und der Raumschiffgröße (1000 Zellen) in den Spieleinstellungen.
description.russian: Пройдите всю игру с минимальными ограничениями на размер станции (2000 ячеек) и размер космического корабля (1000 ячеек) в настройках игрового процесса.
description.schinese: 在游戏设置中对空间站大小（2000 个单元）和宇宙飞船大小（1000 个单元）进行最小限制的情况下完成整个游戏。
description.spanish: Completa todo el juego con restricciones mínimas en cuanto al tamaño de la estación (2000 celdas) y el tamaño de la nave espacial (1000 celdas) en la configuración del juego.

description.brazilian: Complete 5 conquistas "Vontade de Ferro" em um jogo.
description.english: Complete 5 "Iron Will" achievements in one game.
description.french: Terminez 5 succès « Volonté de fer » en une seule partie.
description.german: Schließe 5 „Eiserner Wille“-Erfolge in einem Spiel ab.
description.russian: Получите 5 достижений «Железная воля» в одной игре.
description.schinese: 在一场游戏中完成 5 项“钢铁意志”成就。
description.spanish: Completa 5 logros de "Iron Will" en un juego.

description.brazilian: Complete 10 conquistas "Vontade de Ferro" em um jogo.
description.english: Complete 10 "Iron Will" achievements in one game.
description.french: Terminez 10 succès « Volonté de fer » en une seule partie.
description.german: Schließe 10 „Eiserner Wille“-Erfolge in einem Spiel ab.
description.russian: Получите 10 достижений «Железная воля» в одной игре.
description.schinese: 在一场游戏中完成 10 项“钢铁意志”成就。
description.spanish: Completa 10 logros de "Iron Will" en un juego.

description.brazilian: Complete 15 conquistas "Vontade de Ferro" em um jogo.
description.english: Complete 15 "Iron Will" achievements in one game.
description.french: Terminez 15 succès « Volonté de fer » en une seule partie.
description.german: Schließe 15 „Eiserner Wille“-Erfolge in einem Spiel ab.
description.russian: Получите 15 достижений «Железная воля» в одной игре.
description.schinese: 在一场游戏中完成 15 项“钢铁意志”成就。
description.spanish: Completa 15 logros de "Iron Will" en un juego.

description.brazilian: Conclua o tutorial.
description.english: Complete the tutorial.
description.french: Complète le tutoriel.
description.german: Schließe das Tutorial ab.
description.russian: Завершите туториал.
description.schinese: 完成教程。
description.spanish: Completa el tutorial.

description.brazilian: Capture uma nave espacial de uma facção inimiga.
description.english: Capture a spaceship from an enemy faction.
description.french: Capturez un vaisseau spatial d'une faction ennemie.
description.german: Erobere ein Raumschiff einer feindlichen Fraktion.
description.russian: Захватите космический корабль вражеской фракции.
description.schinese: 从敌方阵营夺取一艘宇宙飞船。
description.spanish: Captura una nave espacial de una facción enemiga.

description.brazilian: Perca 100 naves espaciais de combate em batalha.
description.english: Lose 100 combat spaceships in battle.
description.french: Perdez 100 vaisseaux spatiaux de combat au combat.
description.german: Verliere 100 Kampfraumschiffe im Kampf.
description.russian: Потеряйте 100 боевых космических кораблей в бою.
description.schinese: 在战斗中损失 100 艘战斗飞船。
description.spanish: Pierde 100 naves espaciales de combate en batalla.

description.brazilian: Desbloqueie a tecnologia Matter Materializer.
description.english: Unlock Matter Materializer technology.
description.french: Débloquez la technologie Matter Materializer.
description.german: Schalten Sie die Matter Materializer-Technologie frei.
description.russian: Разблокируйте технологию Материализатора Материи.
description.schinese: 解锁物质物化器技术。
description.spanish: Desbloquea la tecnología Matter Materializer.

description.brazilian: Ative "Faixas de música estendidas" nas opções do menu principal.
description.english: Activate "Extended Music Tracks" in the main menu options.
description.french: Activez « Pistes de musique étendues » dans les options du menu principal.
description.german: Aktivieren Sie „Erweiterte Musiktitel“ in den Hauptmenüoptionen.
description.russian: Активируйте «Расширенные музыкальные треки» в настройках главного меню.
description.schinese: 在主菜单选项中激活“扩展音乐曲目”。
description.spanish: Activa "Pistas de música extendidas" en las opciones del menú principal.

displayName.brazilian: Eu não sabia que era possível
displayName.english: I didn't know it was possible
displayName.french: Je ne savais pas que c'était possible
displayName.german: Ich wusste nicht, dass es möglich ist

description.brazilian: Capture um setor que vale 100.000 unidades de energia com uma nave espacial equipada apenas com baterias T1.
description.english: Capture a sector worth 100,000 energy units with a spaceship equipped with only T1 batteries.
description.french: Capturez un secteur d'une valeur de 100 000 unités d'énergie avec un vaisseau spatial équipé uniquement de batteries T1.
description.german: Erobern Sie einen Sektor im Wert von 100.000 Energieeinheiten mit einem Raumschiff, das nur mit T1-Batterien ausgestattet ist.
description.russian: Захватите сектор стоимостью 100,000 единиц энергии космическим кораблем, оборудованным только батареями Т1.
description.schinese: 使用仅配备 T1 电池的宇宙飞船占领价值 100,000 能量单位的区域。
description.spanish: Captura un sector por valor de 100.000 unidades de energía con una nave espacial equipada únicamente con baterías T1.

description.brazilian: Atualize qualquer planeta para o nível 6.
description.english: Upgrade any planet to level 6.
description.french: Améliorez n'importe quelle planète au niveau 6.
description.german: Werte einen beliebigen Planeten auf Level 6 auf.
description.russian: Улучшите любую планету до уровня 6.
description.schinese: 将任意星球升级至 6 级。
description.spanish: Mejora cualquier planeta al nivel 6.

description.brazilian: Atualize qualquer planeta para o nível 9.
description.english: Upgrade any planet to level 9.
description.french: Améliorez n'importe quelle planète au niveau 9.
description.german: Werte einen beliebigen Planeten auf Level 9 auf.
description.russian: Улучшите любую планету до уровня 9.
description.schinese: 将任意星球升级至 9 级。
description.spanish: Mejora cualquier planeta al nivel 9.

description.brazilian: Atualize qualquer planeta para o nível 12.
description.english: Upgrade any planet to level 12.
description.french: Améliorez n'importe quelle planète au niveau 12.
description.german: Werte einen beliebigen Planeten auf Level 12 auf.
description.russian: Улучшите любую планету до уровня 12.
description.schinese: 将任意星球升级至 12 级。
description.spanish: Mejora cualquier planeta al nivel 12.

description.brazilian: Complete 100 atualizações de planetas.
description.english: Complete 100 planet upgrades.
description.french: Terminez 100 améliorations de planète.
description.german: Schließe 100 Planeten-Upgrades ab.
description.russian: Выполните 100 улучшений планет.
description.schinese: 完成 100 个星球升级。
description.spanish: Completa 100 mejoras planetarias.

description.brazilian: Complete 500 atualizações de planetas.
description.english: Complete 500 planet upgrades.
description.french: Terminez 500 améliorations de planète.
description.german: Schließe 500 Planeten-Upgrades ab.
description.russian: Выполните 500 улучшений планет.
description.schinese: 完成 500 个星球升级。
description.spanish: Completa 500 mejoras planetarias.

description.brazilian: Complete 2500 atualizações de planetas.
description.english: Complete 2,500 planet upgrades.
description.french: Terminez 2500 améliorations de planète.
description.german: Schließe 2500 Planeten-Upgrades ab.
description.russian: Выполните 2 500 улучшений планет.
description.schinese: 完成 2500 个星球升级。
description.spanish: Completa 2500 mejoras planetarias.

description.brazilian: A nave ficou sem energia após um hipersalto manual.
description.english: The spaceship was left without energy after a manual hyperjump.
description.french: Le vaisseau spatial s'est retrouvé sans énergie après un hypersaut manuel.
description.german: Nach einem manuellen Hypersprung blieb das Raumschiff ohne Energie.
description.russian: Космический корабль остался без энергии после ручного гиперпрыжка.
description.schinese: 手动超级跳跃后，飞船失去了能量。
description.spanish: La nave espacial se quedó sin energía tras un hipersalto manual.

description.brazilian: Reconstrua uma estação destruída.
description.english: Rebuild a destroyed station.
description.french: Reconstruisez une gare détruite.
description.german: Baue eine zerstörte Station wieder auf.
description.russian: Восстановите разрушенную станцию.
description.schinese: 重建被毁坏的车站。
description.spanish: Reconstruir una estación destruida.

description.brazilian: Reconstrua sua nave espacial em um tipo diferente reatribuindo o projeto.
description.english: Rebuild your spaceship into a different type by reassigning the blueprint.
description.french: Reconstruisez votre vaisseau spatial dans un type différent en réaffectant le plan.
description.german: Bauen Sie Ihr Raumschiff in einen anderen Typ um, indem Sie den Bauplan neu zuweisen.
description.russian: Перестройте космический корабль в другой тип, переназначив блупринт.
description.schinese: 通过重新分配蓝图将您的宇宙飞船重建为不同类型。
description.spanish: Reconstruye tu nave espacial en un tipo diferente reasignando el plano.

description.brazilian: Crie um estoque de 1 milhão de torpedos nucleares em instalações de armazenamento quântico.
description.english: Create a stockpile of 1 million nuclear torpedoes in quantum storage facilities.
description.french: Créez un stock d'un million de torpilles nucléaires dans des installations de stockage quantique.
description.german: Erstellen Sie einen Vorrat von 1 Million Atomtorpedos in Quantenspeichereinrichtungen.
description.russian: Создайте запас в 1 миллион ядерных боеголовок в квантовых хранилищах.
description.schinese: 在量子存储设施中储存 100 万枚核鱼雷。
description.spanish: Crear una reserva de 1 millón de torpedos nucleares en instalaciones de almacenamiento cuántico.

description.brazilian: Crie um estoque de 1 milhão de contêineres de antimatéria em instalações de armazenamento quântico.
description.english: Create a stockpile of 1 million antimatter containers in quantum storage facilities.
description.french: Créez un stock d’un million de conteneurs d’antimatière dans des installations de stockage quantique.
description.german: Erstellen Sie einen Vorrat von 1 Million Antimateriebehältern in Quantenspeichereinrichtungen.
description.russian: Создайте запас в 1 миллион контейнеров антиматерии в квантовых хранилищах.
description.schinese: 在量子存储设施中建立 100 万个反物质容器的库存。
description.spanish: Crear una reserva de 1 millón de contenedores de antimateria en instalaciones de almacenamiento cuántico.

displayName.spanish: El poder de la mente electrónica

description.brazilian: Teleporte qualquer recurso arrastando-o.
description.english: Teleport any resource by dragging it.
description.french: Téléportez n'importe quelle ressource en la faisant glisser.
description.german: Teleportieren Sie eine beliebige Ressource, indem Sie sie ziehen.
description.russian: Телепортируйте перетаскиванием любой ресурс.
description.schinese: 通过拖动来传送任何资源。
description.spanish: Teletransporta cualquier recurso arrastrándolo.
